title: The Implied Analyst 12-Month Target For EZM - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the underlying holdings of the ETFs in our coverage universe at ETF Channel , we have compared the trading price of each holding against the average analyst 12-month forward target price, and computed the weighted average implied analyst target price for the ETF itself. For the WisdomTree U.S. MidCap Fund ETF (Symbol: EZM), we found that the implied analyst target price for the ETF based upon its underlying holdings is $44.34 per unit.
10 ETFs With Most Upside To Analyst Targets »
